channel.title: Source SDK problem/s
channel.description:
Whenever I run Source SDK and go to the Face poser, I get a fatal error saying: [quote] FATAL ERROR
Unable to find gameinfo.txt. Solutions:
1. Read [url]https://www.valve-erc.com/srcsdk/faq.htm#NoGameDir[/url] 2. Run vconfig to specify which game you're working on 3. Add -game <path> on the command line where <path> is the directory that gameinfo.txt is in. [/quote] 1. Website doesn't work. 2. Wut. 3. Wut.
I don't know what's happened. Since I reinstalled Steam, This has just been happening. I reinstalled it again and it still happens.
Any solutions guys?
Thanks. :smiley:
EDIT
Something else: In the main menu for Source SDK. Anything I try to go into: e.g Hammer, Faceposer etc.
I get this message: [quote] Warning The configuration information for the game you're trying to edit is invalid or missing. [/quote]

item.title: Source SDK problem/s
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Brother Shrike:

go into the game directory

(i.e. C:\Program Files\steam\steamapps\username\insurgency\insurgency)
and check if the gameinfo.txt is there.

Does this happen for every game that you mod for or just some of them?

If it happens for every game you might want to check the gameinfo.txt in the sdk folder, i.e. \steamapps\sourcesdk\bin\ep1\bin\vconfig\

you could also just go into your steamapps folder and search for gameinfo.txt

I have 3 gameinfo.txt files.
One in Garry’s Mod
another in Source SDK
and another in the Source SDK bin in the EP1 bin.
